comments:
I am trying to deploy Birt 2.1 on weblogic 8.2 sp5
but i get the error pasted below
i have learnt that the linkate error is occuring only when iam using jrockit81sp5_142_08 as the jre 
the jrockit works much better with weblogic than jdk142_08  and our corporate is been using jrockit for its efficiency factors since a long time and switching to jdk just for using birt is not a feasible solution. 
can you please help me how i can make birt 2.1 run on jrockit where jrockit is very similar to jdk with slight enhancements.
 
Birt 2.0 works with jrockit without any problems but there is not jndi capability in birt2.0
if there is a way i can make birt 2.0 accept a weblogic jndi that would be a great help
thanks

I am trying to deploy birt on weblogic 8.2 sp5 it uses JROCKIT


(In reply to comment #2)
> Is that an OSGI issue?
schedule to 2.1.1 for investigation.  Depends on research result, schedule the fix to 2.2.0 or checkin to 2.1.1.
also suggest try out WL 8.2 Sp6 or newer service packs.

Test in Weblogic 9 with jrockit 1.5, it works fine.
Further test is doing with Weblogic 8.1 sp6. It seems that wl 8.2 does not exist. A misspelling? I can only download 8.1 sp6 in www.bea.com.

Weblogic 8.1SP6 or sp5 contains old version JS.JAR, so there are some conflicts about some classes. However we fixed them after birt 2.1. So please try it with the latest birt build. 
Test in weblogic 8.1.6(8.1 with sp6) and jrockit81sp6_142_10 with the latest build, it works well. No exception is thrown. So suggest to download the latest build or update wl to 9.0.
